name: MPSImageDilate
desc: A filter that finds the maximum pixel value in a rectangular region centered around each pixel in the source image.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int, values: UnsafePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Initializes the kernel with a specified width, height, and weight values.

items.name: var kernelHeight: Int
items.desc: The height of the filter window. which must be an odd number.

items.name: var kernelWidth: Int
items.desc: The width of the filter window which must be an odd number.
